title: Drawing, "Design for Hebrew Text for Ark Curtain, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos, California", 1968–69
medium: Pen and ink, graphite on white paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite above Hebrew words:  Through you all the families...; each Hebrew character accompanied by a number in graphite, reading right to left:  2, 16, 8,9,10,12,6,15 [all encircled]; in pen and black ink, lower left: Life
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Three Hebrew words (v'cha kol mishp'chot) which translate as, " and all the families..."

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Hebrew Text for Ark Curtain, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos, California", 1968–69.
1968–69. Pen and ink, graphite on white paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-77-b.
